blockers.title: File Path Divergence
blockers.description: Claude Code (terminal) and other AI agents see different absolute paths
blockers.impact: Cross-agent coordination impossible, session handoffs fail
blockers.solution: Use relative paths only + .mosaic/ JSON state
blockers.resolution: Relative paths enforced via Gate 1. All docs use relative paths. .mosaic/ JSON system is canonical state.

blockers.title: Railway Deployment Timeout
blockers.description: railway up times out due to 45MB upload size limit
blockers.solution: Switch to GitHub-based deployment (user approved D4)
blockers.resolution: Migrated to Render with GitHub integration. Railway completely removed.

blockers.title: Railway CLI Linking Ambiguity
blockers.description: railway link fails with 'Project not found'
blockers.solution: GitHub deployment makes CLI linking unnecessary
blockers.resolution: Railway project deleted. Render uses GitHub integration. Railway CLI unlinked.

blockers.title: Documentation Overload
blockers.description: 131 session docs + 500+ total markdown files create confusion
blockers.impact: Agents waste time reading stale docs, cannot find canonical state
blockers.resolution: Created DOCUMENTATION_MAP.md (canonical index), archive script ready, .mosaic/ system now canonical

blockers.title: Validation Blind Spot - Production Reality Not Checked
blockers.description: 8-gate system validated LOCAL STATE (git, JSON, code) but NOT PRODUCTION REALITY (dead backends, broken URLs, failed deployments)
blockers.impact: Railway stayed connected for days after migration causing 30+ deployment failures. User received hundreds of failure messages.
blockers.resolution: Created Gate 9 to validate: backend health, frontend loads, URLs match, no dead backends, deployment configs valid. All 5 checks pass.
